amendment.description: To strike a provision relating to expediting completion of the Mountain Valley Pipeline.

vote.text: Amendment SA 101 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 69. Record Vote Number: 145.

action.text: Amendment SA 101 proposed by Senator Kaine. (consideration: CR S1890) To strike a provision relating to expediting completion of the Mountain Valley Pipeline.
